name: documentarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or consists of documents or records: It is well attested documentarily that rye was widespread as a grain crop at that time. The athletes were documentarily proven to have taken performance-enhancing drugs. Related word
document
More examplesFewer examplesIt was extremely difficult to verify whether the diary was documentarily genuine.Although he was not an academic sociologist, he was documentarily very knowledgeable.She is documentarily eligible to apply for refugee status, but there is no guarantee she will be successful.
